sentences.sContent: The gas station just neighbours to the motel.
sentences.sCn: 加油站就在汽车旅馆的附近。

sentences.sContent: I also have to get back to the motel. The manager took my passport last night, and now he and the passport are nowhere to be found.
sentences.sCn: 我也必须回到汽车旅馆去，因为旅馆经理昨天晚上拿走了我的护照，到现在为止他本人和我的护照都不知所踪。

remMethod.val: motor(汽车) ＋ hotel(旅馆) → 汽车旅馆

trans.tranOther: a hotel for people who are travelling by car, where you can park your car outside your room
